result.eng: He paid the rent to the landlord.
result.ga: d'íoc sé an cíos leis an tiarna talún
result.orig: D'íoc sé an cíos leis an tiarna talún
result.html: d'íoc sé an cíos leis an tiarna talúnHe paid the rent to the landlord.
result.ponchtml: d'íoc sé an cíos leis an tiarna talúnHe paid the rent to the landlord.

result.eng: This is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.
result.ga: uime sin dhíbir an tiarna as gairdín Éidin é
result.orig: Uime sin dhíbir an Tiarna as gairdín Éidin é
result.html: uime sin dhíbir an tiarna as gairdín Éidin éThis is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.
result.ponchtml: uime sin ḋíbir an tiarna as gairdín Éidin éThis is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.

result.eng: My Lord knows what I've done.
result.ga: tá a fhios ag mo thiarna orm
result.orig: Tá a fhios ag mo Thiarna orm
result.html: tá a fhios ag mo thiarna ormMy Lord knows what I've done.
result.ponchtml: tá a ḟios ag mo ṫiarna ormMy Lord knows what I've done.
